title: HMCL错误报告，求解答
author: P-minecraft
txt_content:
[13:24:25] [main/INFO] *** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.4.1.6 ***
[13:24:25] [main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[13:24:38] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[13:24:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[13:24:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[13:24:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[13:24:39] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: 1.8.0_77
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 4008
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making launcher args.
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] Starting process
[13:24:45] [Game Launcher/INFO] Have started the process
[13:25:04] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: -1
[13:25:04] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: -1

replies.author: liulee
replies.txt_content: 会不会是你的最大内存设置过大或过小了，你设置成1024试试，再不行就设成512，如图

replies.author: TSStudio
replies.txt_content:
请具体说明:
例游戏版本 有API的话API版本 分配的内存大小 总内存大小 系统位数等
光靠这点报告 高手也无法分析

replies.author: P-minecraft
replies.txt_content:
20050811 发表于 2016-4-9 15:41
请具体说明:
例游戏版本 有API的话API版本 分配的内存大小 总内存大小 系统位数等
光靠这点报告 高手也无法 ...
游戏版本 1.8.0
API Forge11.14.4.1563
分配的内存大小 1024
总内存大小 4008
系统位数x64
一年前的游戏，今年就更新了启动器（好像是2.3XX到2.4.1.6）就这样了。

replies.author: aa710411
replies.txt_content: 可能是你的JAVA的问题，或者是杀毒软件的问题，或者是你内存的问题，还有可能是你的文件坏了，希望可以帮助到你
